pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, July 16, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, July 16 2016:

Calgary, Alberta

9:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will attend Minister Kent Hehrâ€™s Stampede Pancake Breakfast.                       

Kerby Centre Gym
1133 7 Ave. S.W.
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media: 

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Media should enter through west entrance

Please note: all times are local.
